claimOwnership().details: This function is only callable by the `_pendingOwner`.

push((uint256,uint32,uint64,uint64,uint3.details: Restricts new draws for N seconds by forcing timelock on the next target draw id.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setManager(address).details: Throws if called by any account other than the owner.

returns._0: Boolean to indicate if the operation was successful or not.

Deployed(address,address,address).notice: Emitted when the contract is deployed.

DrawLockedPushedAndTotalNetworkTicketSup.notice: Emitted when Draw is locked, pushed to Draw DrawBuffer and totalNetworkTicketSupply is pushed to PrizeDistributionFactory

claimOwnership().notice: Allows the `_pendingOwner` address to finalize the transfer.

owner().notice: Returns the address of the current owner.

push((uint256,uint32,uint64,uint64,uint3.notice: Locks next Draw, pushes Draw to DraWBuffer and pushes totalNetworkTicketSupply to PrizeDistributionFactory.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows current owner to set the `_pendingOwner` address.

userdoc.notice: The ReceiverTimelockTrigger smart contract is an upgrade of the L2TimelockTimelock smart contract. Reducing protocol risk by eliminating off-chain computation of PrizeDistribution parameters. The timelock will only pass the total supply of all tickets in a "PrizePool Network" to the prize distribution factory contract.
